DOC.brief_summary: Head Neck Squaumous Cell Cancer ( HNSCC ) 6th common cancer United States 3rd common worldwide . Risk factor include abuse tobacco alcohol . Survival related stage HNSCC treatment seek . Most HNSCC patient present advance staged disease . This screening activity educate patient HNSCC rick factor screen pre malignant and/or early stag lesion .
